title: MUST SEE space! When you dream of SF, this is it! Utilities included.
posting_body: ['Contact info:', 'Christina | Resident Manager |', 'show contact info', 'Corner Penthouse View Unit in a FANTASTIC vintage building!!', '1405 Van Ness Ave, San Francisco CA 94109 APT 700', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Quintessential San Francisco!!!', 'Lovely views from huge windows!!!', 'Welcome to The Inverness, a stately and beloved vintage building in the bustling Van Ness Corridor.', 'Our units feature high ceilings, decorative moldings, and spacious rooms.', 'The building is anchored by a glorious marble semi-spiral staircase on one side and - thank goodness - an elevator on the other side!', "Everywhere you turn in here you'll find fantastic vintage details!", 'We are also delighted to have Wayo Sushi and Starbucks in our building as well as a dental office for the follow up.', '😉', 'This unit has had the following recent upgrades:', '*Lighting', '*Keyless unit entry', '*Fresh paint', 'This is a corner unit with east and south facing windows and high ceilings.', 'The bathroom and kitchen feature modern cabinetry, faucets, appliances, etc.', 'Two large entry closets and an additional oversized closet provide ample space for storage.', 'A private patio wraps around the east and south sides of the unit.', 'Wood floors feature throughout.', 'Clocking in somewhere around ~800 sqft, this studio is larger than many 1-bed units in SF!', 'All basic utilities are included.', 'Let me know when you want to take a look.', 'We’re ready to welcome our newest member to The Inverness “family”.', 'Available unfurnished for immediate move-in.', 'We might be able to furnish it for you as well.', 'Walk Score 99', '— Walker’s Paradise', '<URL>', 'KEY DETAILS', 'Rent:', '$3,500/mo', 'Security Deposit:', '$3,500', 'Year Built:', 'early 1913', 'Bedrooms:', '0', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Floors:', 'wood', 'Laundry:', 'Laundry in basement', 'Other:', 'Updated kitchen and bath, fireplace is decorative, sqft is estimated', 'Parking:', 'None in building, several garages nearby, “G” permit zone', 'Storage:', 'Available for rent in the basement', 'Lease Duration:', '12 months', 'Lease Terms:', 'Cats negotiable.', 'No smoking.', 'Basic utilities are included.', 'Application process required for all potential adult occupants.', 'Application link provided after showing.', 'Viewing:', 'Contact Christina for appointment.', 'Contact info:', 'Christina Sutton | Resident Manager | DRE01930675 |', 'show contact info', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
